mapper.select: select * from orderlist o inner join courier_order co on co.order_id = o.order_id inner join courier c on c.courier_id = co.courier_id where c.courier_id = #{courierId} order by o.time desc

select * from orderlist o inner join station_order so on so.order_id = o.order_id inner join station s on s.station_id = so.station_id where s.station_id = #{stationId} and (o.current_courier is null or o.current_courier = '') and o.current_station = #{stationName} order by o.time desc
mapper.insert: insert into Courier(courier_id, courier_name, courier_phone, province, city, area, picture, station_id) values (#{courierId}, #{courierName}, #{courierPhone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{picture}, #{stationId})
insert into Courier(courier_name, courier_phone, province, city, area, picture, station_id) values (#{courierName}, #{courierPhone}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{picture}, #{stationId})
